title: New York Teen Gets Accepted To All Ivy League Schools
teaser: High school senior Harold Ekeh plans to go to college. He applied to 13 schools â€” including 8 Ivy League schools. He got into all of them. His family moved to the U.S. from Nigeria when he was eight.
